whatIsRPMS.title: Remote Power Management System
whatIsRPMS.subtitle: Remote Power Management System
whatIsRPMS.description: RPMS is a specialized solution for remotely monitoring and controlling power of various equipment at highway ITS (Intelligent Transportation System) sites. It consists of panel-type hardware and web-based management software.

hardware.title: Panel-type Hardware
hardware.description: Up to 8 AC output ports, built-in circuit breaker per port, voltage/current/temperature sensors

software.title: Web-based Management Software
software.description: Real-time monitoring dashboard, remote power control, event logging and notifications

protocol.title: Dedicated Communication Protocol
protocol.description: TCP/IP-based real-time bidirectional communication, Keep-Alive session maintenance

hero.title: Remote Power Management for Highway ITS Equipment
hero.subtitle: RPMS - Remote Power Management System
hero.description: Remotely monitor and control power for VMS, CCTV, detectors, and other Intelligent Transportation System (ITS) equipment on highways. Maximize equipment uptime with real-time voltage/current monitoring and threshold alarms.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: From real-time monitoring to remote control, powerful RPMS capabilities

remoteControl.title: Per-Port Remote Control
remoteControl.description: Individual port ON/OFF or batch control from web dashboard. Instant power cutoff in emergencies.

monitoring.title: Real-time Status Monitoring
monitoring.description: Live streaming of per-port voltage (V), current (A), and power status. Device temperature at a glance.

scheduling.title: Threshold Settings & Alarms
scheduling.description: Set temperature, voltage, and current thresholds. Automatic alarms when exceeded for immediate response.

alerts.title: Event Logging & Notifications
alerts.description: Record all events including power cutoffs, temperature/voltage/current anomalies. Real-time alerts for quick response.

security.title: TCP/IP Real-time Communication
security.description: Stable bidirectional communication with dedicated protocol (v2.2). Keep-Alive for session maintenance.

performance.title: Multi-Port Support
performance.description: Up to 8 ports supported. 4-port and 1-port models available. Independent control and monitoring per port.

useCases.title: ITS Equipment Applications
useCases.subtitle: Field-proven remote power management solution for highways

cta.title: Contact Us About RPMS
cta.description: We'll propose a remote power management solution optimized for your ITS site.
